entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
